title: Who Else Were They Spying On? The Clues are Everywhere. (Ep 1137)
description:
In this episode, I address the new information in the IG report that may expose a more widespread spying scandal than anticipated. I discuss FBI texts that make more sense in light of the new information. I also address the suspicious Schumer press conference yesterday and a CNN appearance where Schumer gets flustered by a hard question. News Picks:

There’s another FBI agent in hot water over the Spygate scandal.

The media flip-flop on impeachment is hilarious.

Impeachment is becoming more unpopular by the day.

This 2017 piece by Natasha Bertrand is indicative of the disturbing relationship between the Spygate conspirators and the media.

Sleazy Adam Schiff starts the “Trump colluded in 2020” narrative.

The IG report proves that Adam Schiff has been lying about Spygate the entire time. 

Black voter support for President Trump is growing and at the highest levels for a GOP president in decades. 

Swing voters reveal they are sticking with Trump in 2020.

Liberals hate voter ID but this photo dismantles their narrative.

 

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
